column2: Well, what has happened to them?
column3: Well, what has happened to them?

column2: Arrested, were they? inquired Athos; "is it known why?"
column3: Arrested, were they? inquired Athos; "is it known why?"

column2: Where were they taken? asked Athos.
column3: Where were they taken? asked Athos.

column2: He could, like the king, touch the greatest of us on the head, and touching them make such heads shake on their shoulders.
column3: He could, like the king, touch the greatest of us on the head, and touching them make such heads shake on their shoulders.

column2: The two friends departed--Aramis to return to Paris, Athos to take measures preparatory to an interview with the queen.
column3: The two friends departed-Aramis to return to Paris, Athos to take measures preparatory to an interview with the queen.
